channel.title: How To Change Your Server IP?
channel.description: Well, I know how to make my server IP, But I want to change it. To change it would I just go to No-IP.com and change it from there? Because my server runs and I don't even need No-IP running for the server to work?!? And help please :(

item.title: How To Change Your Server IP?
item.dc:creator: @EpicScape EpicScape
item.description:
@EpicScape wrote:

About creating more IPs, does that make me able to have people connect with more than 1 IP? If so, Do I just add another one and they can connect with that IP?

Read full topic
item.source: How To Change Your Server IP?

item.title: How To Change Your Server IP?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

EpicScape:

Well, I know how to make my server IP, But I want to change it. To change it would I just go to No-IP.com and change it from there? Because my server runs and I don’t even need No-IP running for the server to work?!? And help please

Just go to the No-IP website and delete or edit your existing IP. You also have the option to create more.

Read full topic
item.source: How To Change Your Server IP?
